description: This file implements a Dojo Object Store using local storage for a to-do application, providing methods for CRUD operations and querying stored data.

classes.name: TodoLocalStorage
classes.description: A Dojo store implementation that uses local storage to persist to-do items, supporting CRUD and query operations.

methods.name: _loadStorage
methods.description: Loads and parses the stored to-do data from local storage.

methods.name: _saveStorage
methods.description: Serializes and saves the to-do data to local storage.

methods.name: postscript
methods.description: Mixes provided properties into the store instance.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves an object by its ID from local storage.

methods.name: getIdentity
methods.description: Returns the identity property value of an object.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Stores or updates an object in local storage.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new object to local storage, throws error if it already exists.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an object by its ID from local storage.

methods.name: query
methods.description: Queries objects based on a provided query object.
